message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $170.  This product is truly top-notch, and I'm confident you'd find it worth the price.
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $155. Can we meet in the middle?
